sentences.en: "I see anti-depressants as a lifestyle drug," says Dr Charlton.
sentences.cn: “我认为抗抑郁药是一种改善生活品质的药物，”查尔顿医生说。

sentences.en: Bob died of a heart attack, brought on by his lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃死于由他的生活方式引起的心脏病突发。

sentences.en: He was troubled by the lifestyle of his son.
sentences.cn: 他对儿子的生活方式感到很担心。

sentences.en: Her dream is to present a lifestyle show on television.
sentences.cn: 她的梦想是主持一档电视时尚生活节目。

sentences.en: His methods were unorthodox, and his lifestyle eccentric.
sentences.cn: 他的方法不同寻常，他的生活方式也相当奇特。

sentences.en: I drove home contemplating my own more pedestrian lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 我开车回家，一路上思考着自己更为乏味的生活方式。

sentences.en: I think the film is a validation of our lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 我认为这部电影肯定了我们的生活方式。

sentences.en: Many people thrive on a stressful lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 有许多人喜欢充满压力的生活方式。

sentences.en: Most media coverage disapproves of the travellers' lifestyle and values.
sentences.cn: 大多数媒体报道都不赞成那些旅行者的生活方式和价值观。

sentences.en: Recent medical studies confirm the efficacy of a healthier lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 最新医学研究证实了较为健康的生活方式的好处。

sentences.en: Regular exercise is part of a healthy lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 经常锻炼身体是健康生活方式的一部分。

sentences.en: Suddenly she was catapulted into his jet-set lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 突然间，她过上了他那种阔佬生活。

sentences.en: The hunter-gatherer lifestyle today survives precariously in remote regions.
sentences.cn: 今天狩猎采集的生活方式在偏远地区侥幸留存了下来。

sentences.en: The latest lifestyle trend is downshifting.
sentences.cn: 最新的生活方式趋于放慢生活节奏。

sentences.en: They enjoyed an income and lifestyle that many people would envy.
sentences.cn: 他们的收入和生活方式会令很多人都羡慕不已。

sentences.en: This year people are going for luxury and buying lifestyle products.
sentences.cn: 今年人们推崇奢华，掀起了购买时尚生活产品的风潮。

trans.tran_en: the way a person or group of people live, including the place they live in, the things they own, the kind of job they do, and the activities they enjoy
